akn:section.akn:heading: Data exchange standards for improved interoperability

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Designation The Secretary shall, in consultation with an interagency work group established by the Office of Management and Budget, and considering State government perspectives, designate data exchange standards to govern, under this chapter—
(b) Requirements The data exchange standards required by subsection (a) shall, to the maximum extent practicable—
(c) Rules of construction Nothing in this section requires a change to existing data exchange standards for Federal reporting found to be effective and efficient.
